sense.def: Abbreviated Designation tai chi 胎赤 , fetal red; Alternative Names tai chi feng yan 胎赤風眼 , fetal red wind eyes; tai chi lan yan 胎赤爛眼 , fetal red festering eyes. Pathological Condition of red festering eyes of children from birth on that remain uncured for a long time. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 102: 治胎赤眼久不瘥，昏暗漠漠，瞳仁脹痛，羚羊角湯方 , “To cure fetal red eyes that have not been cured for an extended period of time, with [patients having] dim vision, and the pupil being distended and painful, [use] the recipe for the decoction with ling yang jiao ”.
